page.title: 10TEENAGERS (continued).
page.content: In my spare time I play stoolball and snooker and work in the kitchen at the local pub.Sometimes I meet my friends down at the recreation ground, but this is usually only in the evenings when we have the time to ourselves.In fact there is not very much for young people in Barcombe.That is unless you are sporting and like football,cricket or stoolball.There are the occasional discos but nothing at all in the way of permanent entertainment.A youth club would be good to stop us sitting in the pub or down the recreation ground getting bored.However I like Barcombe. It is a nice little village.
